GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted in descending order

GET /api/articles/:article_Id.description: serves the article corresponding to the provided article_Id

GET /api/articles/:article_Id/comments.description: serves the comments corresponding to given article_id
